meanings.definition: Having or showing the characteristics of gout.
meanings.sent1: His swollen and painful toe was the goutiest in the entire family.
meanings.sent2: The doctor confirmed that his diet was the goutiest she had ever seen.
meanings.sent3: Despite his efforts to avoid rich foods, his goutiest tendencies always resurfaced.
meanings.sent4: The goutiest flare-up felt like tiny daggers stabbing his foot.
meanings.sent5: The goutiest symptoms made walking unbearable for him.

meanings.sent1: Out of all the patients, he was the goutiest in terms of joint inflammation.
meanings.sent2: Her ankles were the goutiest the doctor had ever seen.
meanings.sent3: The goutiest man in the room tried to hide his discomfort with a smile.
meanings.sent4: The goutiest joints felt like they were on fire.
meanings.sent5: The goutiest flare-up he experienced left him unable to walk for days.
